byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: A tax-cut proposal by the Republican presidential candidate Marco Rubio has significant family-centric provisions but is also a bonanza for the rich.

headline.print_headline: Finding a Modern Balance in the Tradition of Tax Cuts
headline.main: Finding a Modern Balance in the Tradition of Tax Cuts

snippet: A tax-cut proposal by the Republican presidential candidate Marco Rubio has significant family-centric provisions but is also a bonanza for the rich.
